page.title: 12Hafodarthen Farm.
page.content: {An account written by Craig Davies. Hafodarthen Farm has belonged to my family for many years.It is in the community of St.Illtyd's,which is a small mainly farming community consisting of three very large farms, and one small holding.The largest of the three farms is ours Hafodarthen, then Argoed farm and Abercommon. Hafodarthen farm covers about 95 hectares.Most of the land is grassland but sometimes we grow about 4 acres of swede or rape as stockfeed.We also have sheep and cattle. {Cattle: Breeding cows 34 Store cattle 12 Calves 32 Bulls 1. {Sheep: Ewes 800approx. Lambs 700approx Yearlings 200approx Rams 16.
